data.text: @BrimBlam I'M SAYIN! I really was looking forward to having my KO Edition this week! 😭😭😭
@Neo_Raichu Better slap their shit and fix this
@BrimBlam I found it. They messed up and it got sent to a previous address after I requested and confirmed a change 6 months ago. :/
@BrimBlam You got yours? WONDER WHERE MINE IS?
@Wrath4life @LimitedRunGames @Ubisoft Oh yeah fuck ubisoft, only thanking them  for actually allowing this to happen at all.
@Wrath4life Yooo thats sick kinda like this card more
@BrimBlam I guess the bonus card they gave us is random. I noticed yours is different from mine. https://t.co/EtFQsTVZ6X
@BrimBlam @LimitedRunGames @Ubisoft It's really neat but I wouldn't thank @Ubisoft with all the shit they did. 😤 But this K.O Edition was worth the wait. 😁
